alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 29 at 12:18PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...NEAR BLIZZARD CONDITIONS CONTINUE ACROSS EASTERN NEW HAVEN AND PARTS OF MIDDLESEX COUNTY IN SOUTHERN CONNECTICUT... Bands of heavy snow at the rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour, accompanied by north winds gusting between 35 and 45 mph, will continue to produce near blizzard conditions, with visibility occasionally less than one quarter mile, and considerable blowing and drifting of snow. Travel is strongly discouraged! If you must travel, bring a winter survival kit. If you become stranded, stay with your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven
